unnormalised: Hey! Loved reading about PT Usha. Remember watching "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag" and feeling so inspired! More stories like these, please. Maybe a biography on someone from IIT or a young cricketer from Ranji trophy? It's amazing knowing the struggles & wins; 100 km cycles, early morning practice - real grit! Makes me proud of our desh.
normalised: Hey! Loved reading about P T Usha. Remember watching "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag" and feeling so inspired! More stories like these, please.
